attributes.action: place restrictions on dog walking on nature reserve.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dog walking on nature reserves in the breeding season can disturb ground-nesting birds and can lead to the nest being abandoned. Dog walking on nature reserves between the months of March and August should have restrictions in place. Dogs should not be allowed off the lead and should stick to paths. Where possible there should be CCTV cameras ensuring that the public behave responsibly.
